attributes.action: Hold a referendum on coming out of the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all the figures o immigration , and the number of foreign prisoners in our jails, I think it is about time we came out of the EU and stood firm on all these issues without a few people in Brussels telling us what we can or cannot do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
